nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-09-05
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-09-05 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

Today's agenda:

- OCWG meeting this morning, talks and collaboration with them.
- VRM discussion.
- OMI_vehicle_* extensions https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/231
- Change OMI_physics_joint to be more like KHR/MSFT physics https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/232
- Add physics materials and filtering similar to KHR/MSFT physics https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/226

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-08-01
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-08-01 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

Here are some PRs that people are welcome and encouraged to review in advanced of the meeting:
- Add physics materials and filtering: https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/226
- glTF Object Model properties: https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/227
- Audio positional shape type: https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/229

Meeting notes

Placeholder link to the last meeting.

## Agenda

- [ ] aaronfranke's schema update PR https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/224
- [ ] aaronfranke's gltf pointer work for godot engine. https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/94165
- [ ] Free to add others. (Edit if you're a part of omigroup or post in the comments.)
